title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Busy cursor not shown during checkbox update
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) and the busy cursor is not shown. This can mislead the user into thinking that the update is not happening.
OB: Currently, the busy cursor is not displayed when updating the checkbox state of the table in the Export Zip feature.
EB: The Export Zip feature should display a busy cursor during the update of checkbox states to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR: Add code to display a busy cursor during the update of checkbox states in the Export Zip feature.
